publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-733 Mr Andy Kerr: Stirling-Alloa-Kincardine Railway and Linked Improvements Bill: Financial Resolutionâ€”That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Stirling-Alloa-Kincardine Railway and Linked Improvements Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act.
